title: Dollar Retreats From Haven Gains After Weak Manufacturing Data
description: The dollar pulled back from its strongest level in two weeks after a reading of US manufacturing activity shrank last month by the most since 2024, wiping out gains seen after the US capture of Venezuela’s President Nicolás Maduro.
content: The dollar pulled back from its strongest level in two weeks after a reading of US manufacturing activity shrank last month by the most since 2024, wiping out gains seen after the US capture of Venezuela’s President Nicolás Maduro.
